scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:js: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.js -t babelify -t stripify | uglifyjs -mc > public/js/script.js
scripts.dev: npm run watch & browser-sync start --server public --files "public/*.html, public/js/*.js, public/css/*.css" --browser "google chrome" --cors --no-ghost-mode
scripts.install-local: npm install babel-preset-es2015 babelify cssnano postcss postcss-cssnext postcss-import stripify --save-dev && mkdir -p public/js && mkdir -p public/css && touch public/index.html && touch public/css/styles.css && touch public/js/script.js && cat src/html/index.html > public/index.html
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
